raiz.texto: Egypt demands a legally binding agreement (not voluntary guidelines) that obliges Ethiopia to release guaranteed minimum flows during drought years to prevent irreversible damage. Invokes the international principle of 'no significant harm' and its historical rights based on the 1929 and 1959 treaties. Declares that all options remain open to protect its vital resource.
